meanings.definition: The land along the edge of a river.
meanings.sent1: The riversides are peaceful places to relax by the water.
meanings.sent2: We had a picnic on the riversides and watched the boats go by.
meanings.sent3: The ducks waddled along the riversides, looking for snacks.
meanings.sent4: The riversides whispered stories of the flowing river to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sun set behind the riversides, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: The area on the side of a river.
meanings.sent1: Fishing is a popular activity on the riversides.
meanings.sent2: The children played games on the riversides during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The riversides hosted a lively community barbecue last weekend.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on the riversides, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The riversides echoed with the laughter of families enjoying nature.
